lead_paragraph: Niger's opposition coalition said on Tuesday its candidate, Hama Amadou, would not contest a run-off election on March 20, effectively ensuring that President Mahamadou Issoufou will win a second term.

headline.main: Niger Opposition Says It Will Boycott Run-Off Election
headline.print_headline: Niger Opposition Says It Will Boycott Run-Off Election

snippet: Niger's opposition coalition said on Tuesday its candidate, Hama Amadou, would not contest a run-off election on March 20, effectively ensuring that President Mahamadou Issoufou will win a second term.
